thread.title: Nintendo Releases Official Unboxing Video for Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Nintendo Releases Official Unboxing Video for Nintendo Switch

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nintendo Releases Official Unboxing Video for Nintendo Switch
text:
As we are now less than a week and a half away from the release of the much-anticipated Nintendo Switch , Nintendo provides with an unboxing video of the console.
First off, as Kit and Krysta point out, the Nintendo Switch comes in a noticeably compact box, considerably smaller than packages for the Xbox One and the PlayStation 4. However, the entire console is just one tablet, so itâ€™s not like this is some amazing feat.
For a brief overview, Joy-Con controllers are positioned in the top of the box with the aforementioned tablet, as below you will find an HDMI and power cable, Joy-Con Grip, Joy-Con strap, and Switch Dock.
Again, this official unboxing arrives as the Nintendo Switch is due on shelves March 3.
For all we know regarding the console, follow here .
